lead_paragraph: The Fed is expected to again pass on an opportunity to raise its interest rate, a move partly owing to the efforts of Ms. Brainard, a Fed governor.

headline.main: Lael Brainard, Donning a Global Lens, Champions Low Rates at Fed

snippet: The Fed is expected to again pass on an opportunity to raise its interest rate, a move partly owing to the efforts of Ms. Brainard, a Fed governor....
abstract: Lael Brainard, member of Federal Reserve Board of Governors, views impending Fed announcement not to raise interest rates now as another win in her efforts to keep rates low to benefit domestic economic growth and global stability; Brainard, a steadfast internationalist, is considered prime candidate for membership in Hillary Clinton’s cabinet if Democratic nominee wins presidency, even possibly becoming first female Treasury secretary.
